thread.title: Halima Aden Just Made Her Milan Fashion Week Debut at the Alberta Ferretti Show
thread.title_full: Halima Aden Just Made Her Milan Fashion Week Debut at the Alberta Ferretti Show

title: Halima Aden Just Made Her Milan Fashion Week Debut at the Alberta Ferretti Show

organizations.name: alberta ferretti show getty images muslim
halima aden just made her milan fashion week debut

text: Getty Images Muslim model Halima Aden is having a great week. A former beauty queen, Aden first hit the radar of the fashion set when she competed for the title of Miss Minnesota USA wearing a burkini and a hijab—a first for the pageant world. But she’s really hit the style stratosphere this month with a string of major fashion gigs. Last week, she announced her contract with IMG Models (home of Gisele, Gigi and Bella Hadid, and Hari Nef, NBD) and walked in the Yeezy Season 5 show , making her official fashion week debut. Today, she's taken her runway dominance overseas with a surprise appearance at the Alberta Ferretti show at Milan fashion week. You May Also Like Fashion 8 Fashion Trends to Look Forward to in 2017 Aden’s spot on the Alberta Ferretti runway alongside industry vets such as Gigi Hadid, Sara Sampaio, and Elsa Hosk sends a major signal about the changing industry. While Yeezy is known for creating buzz-worthy moments on the runway, Ferretti’s shows are more old-school when it comes to fashion—think traditional shows with pretty, romantic aesthetics. Aden’s casting signifies the industry's efforts towards embracing a more inclusive idea of femininity and the female form. Loading
